description: Calum Kavanagh's second-half effort hands League Two promotion chasers Bradford City victory over bottom-placed Carlisle United at Brunton Park.
title: Carlisle United 0-1 Bradford City
title_page: League Two: Carlisle United 0-1 Bradford City - BBC Sport
maintext:
Carlisle United have lost just two of their last eight league games against Bradford City (W4 D2), though have scored just two goals in total across their last four meetings with the Bantams.
After winning the reverse fixture 2-1, Bradford City will be looking to complete a league double over Carlisle United for the first time since the 1985-86 season in the second tier.
Carlisle have won just one of their last nine league games (D4 L4), a 2-1 home victory over Accrington Stanley in December.
